definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="cube"><value name="_placeholderX"><block type="shape_x"></block></value><value name="_placeholderY"><block type="shape_y"></block></value><value name="_placeholderZ"><block type="shape_z"></block></value><value name="radius_xz"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">16</field></block></value><value name="radius_y"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">16</field></block></value><statement name="doinshape"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="block_is_tagged_in"><value name="a"><block type="world_data_blockat"><value name="x"><block type="shape_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="shape_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="shape_z"></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">palamod:unbreakable_explosion</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.7</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="block_remove_drop"><value name="x"><block type="shape_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="shape_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="shape_z"></block></value><value name="x2"><block type="shape_x"></block></value><value name="y2"><block type="shape_y"></block></value><value name="z2"><block type="shape_z"></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="block_remove_with_particles"><value name="x"><block type="shape_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="shape_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="shape_z"></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></statement><next><block type="explode" inline="false"><field name="mode">TNT</field><value name="x"><block type="entity_pos_x"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="entity_pos_y"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="entity_pos_z"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="power"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">16</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_despawn"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block><block type="coord_y" x="495" y="181"></block><block type="coord_x" x="1080" y="180"></block><block type="coord_z" x="387" y="301"></block></xml>
